## FEAT-0047: Community Health Files

## Objective

Add standard open-source community health files to the project root to ensure legal compliance and guide contributors.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] `LICENSE` file (MIT) exists in root.
- [ ] `CONTRIBUTING.md` exists in root with clear guidelines.
- [ ] `CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md` exists in root (Contributor Covenant).

## Technical Tasks

- [ ] Create `LICENSE` file.
- [ ] Create `CONTRIBUTING.md`.
- [ ] Create `CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md`.
